message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take a bit more this time!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a bit more, but not too much!
You're not giving me enough, I'll take more if I have to!
I'm not giving in, you're getting too greedy!
You're getting desperate, I'll take almost all of it!
You're not getting it all, I'm not giving in yet!
You're not budging, I'll take the majority!
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving in yet!
You're running out of time, I'm taking what I can get!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
